I.
The Policy is amended as follows:
1.
The following Coverage Extensions are added to
Section 2. Extensions of Cover:
2.8	
Media
The Insurer shall indemnify the Insureds all 
Financial Loss resulting from a Claimfirst 
made against the Insured during the Period 
of Insurance or the Extended Reporting 
Period, if applicable, for a Wrongful Media 
Act taking place on or after the Retroactive 
Date and prior to the end of the Period of 
Insurance.

be subject to both the applicable Sub-Limit
